info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 04 at 10:01AM EDT until August 04 at 11:00AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: The National Weather Service in Albany has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Fulton County in eastern New York... Southern Herkimer County in eastern New York... Northwestern Montgomery County in eastern New York... * Until 1100 AM EDT. * At 1000 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Bridgewater, or 11 miles south of New Hartford, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Canajoharie, Mohawk, Frankfort, Fort Plain, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, West Winfield, Jordanville, Cedarville, Oppenheim, Elizabethtown, Warren, Palatine Bridge, Nelliston, Ingham Mills, Spinnerville and Cedar Lake. Please report hail size...damaging winds and reports of trees down to the National Weather Service by email at Alb.Stormreport@noaa.gov... On Facebook at www.facebook.com/nwsalbany or twitter @nwsalbany HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
